( Carnage: Of course. I was just about to reply.)

** Carnage had had enough of the sun as it had began to dip down in the 
west, it's rays not so alive and heating as before.
It had been late after noon before she had climbed down from her little 
sunning spot half way up a cliff, her body warmed by the great yellow orb 
above her head...but her stomach growling from nothing to eat since the day 
before.

However, now that she was in the cover of the trees and the sun had long 
disappeared, she was in the mood for a bit of...carnage.
Hunting to put not too fine a point on it.
Through the day her temper hadn't lifted and her hunger had just given her 
an excuse to go out and do just what she felt like doing...strangling 
something!
It always relieved the anger.
Besides, it was better then laying on that ledge and brooding all day about 
things going on the in the world that she couldn't change.
Also, the night air and the thrill of the hunt always cleared her mind and 
made her feel more a part of this planet then any other time. Simply letting 
her beast mode go and letting it do what it wanted, while she left the logic 
of her robot mode begind.

Carnage passed by a rather large tree, finding her way over the huge roots 
and down onto the ground once again.
Away from the battles, away from the bots. This was the life she was ment to 
live!
She shook herself and looked around the trees, lifting her snout to the wind 
now and again to see if she could catch the scent of something.
But there was nothing around.
Just as well anyway.
Most creatures other then smaller rodents didn't dare go out into 
unprotected places like this, where there was no cover other then the roots 
between trees.
Carnage sighed and continued on her way, towards...slag knew where. 
Whereever her nose led her she guessed.
But then...her head snapped up and stared blindly into the darkness around 
her, all of her attention on what she had thought she had just smelled.
Her head darted in a few directions for a moment, catching other whiffs of 
what she knew was game.
It was...something...not large but not all that small...either.
But...by the musky scent...it was covered in fur.
Suddenly her head snapped forward, towards the direction that the 
scent...and a slight grunting was coming from.
Boar!
She sniffed again...and a sow...with...3 piglets!
Carnage growled as her eyes drew into slits and her mouth opened slightly, 
the glands under her top lips which were built into her beast mode letting 
her know of the health of her prey...and that they were a little nervous.
Well...they had every right to be!
Moving forward and placed her feet carefully, moving very slowly before she 
suddenly saw a tusked face dart up, looking towards her.
Carnage froze, stopping her breathing completely so that her prey wouldn't 
know that she was even alive.
The boar still looking at her from behond a root.
She glared at the wild pig.
Now or never!
Carnage bunched up her leg muscles, her tail going stiff and straight behind 
her.
But her target wasn't the boar, it was the sow and smaller swine behind him.
She used the strength in her hind legs to  move quickly and snapp her whole 
body towards the root, smashing into it before she stepped up onto it.
The pigs squeeling in fright and beginning to run awat from the shower of 
splinters she had sent up.
But her eyes had already narrowed onto the sow and her rushing young, not 
even noticing that the boar had stayed behind and was now right under her as 
jumped from the root.
It jumped up with it's tusks in the lead, managing to catch her right on the 
bottom of her thigh.
Carnage fell with a grunt onto the ground, snapping her head back to see the 
boar ready to gore her. But she had no time to deal with him!
She brough her hind legs up against her stomach and then snapped them down 
towards his face, her claws first.
The boar squeeled as blood shot up from it's face and it's head snapped 
back, Carnage smiling and baring her teeth as she heard the saticfying sound 
of a broken neck as the body of the male pig slammed up against the trunk og 
the tree behind it.
Getting to her feet and looking towards the escaping sow, knwoing that the 
boar was still alive from it's pained screames behind her.
Echoing through the trees.
She would come back to finish it's suffering after she had gotten what she 
had come for.
But she was off again, her legs pumping behind her as she moved to gain upin 
the sow which was moving through the trees towards the brush a few hundred 
meters away.
However, the smaller pigs could not keep up with their mother.

Carnage snapped down with her jaws, moving over a small piglet with her body 
and then moving her jaws down, her teeth sinking into the back and front of 
it's neck as her jaws closed.
Then bringing the squirming mass of pink up with her head as she kept 
running, moving along and gaining on it's mother.
Carnage bit down hard onto the head of the small pig as her mody moved 
quickly, feeling the sudden squirt of the tiny thing's brains onto her 
tongue as she crushed it's skull. ( sorry if this is too disgusting for 
some).
The sow was close!
Opening her jaws as she neared the female pig, the corps of the infent 
falling from her jaws, Carnage drew within striking distance.
With a bunching of muscles she lept onto the sows back, both of them 
disappearing into the brush just as the sow had reached it.

The forest echoed with the horrid screams of a dying animal as and growls 
and bloodthirsty snarls followed. The sound of taring flesh coming much 
sooner before the screams eventually softened and then faded, leaving the 
echos of saticfied snarls and the crunching of bones.**
